summary: The Choice in Affordable Housing Act of 2025 aims to increase landlord participation in the Housing Choice Voucher program. It proposes incentives like one-time payments for landlords in low-poverty areas, security deposit assistance, and landlord liaison bonus payments. It also establishes the Herschel Lashkowitz Housing Partnership Fund to further incentivize participation and amends inspection requirements and fair market rent calculations. The bill mandates a report evaluating its effectiveness in expanding housing choice and opportunity.
